data.name: Tap Football Star ! 21/22
data.detailed_description:
follow on facebook for more content added every week :
FB : https://www.facebook.com/Tap-Football-Star-101928271891812

Become a football player and then have a career from 14 to 35 years old
Evolve in 250 teams spread across twenty different championships
Win all trophies from the national cup to the Champion's League
Lead your national team to the heights of the World Cup
Collect individual rewards to become a legend!

I) AIM JUST



Prove your accuracy by clicking precisely when the moving target is level with the soccer ball, but beware! matches go by quickly and time will be running out.
Chain goals to unlock powerful combos until you earn enough experience points to level up!

II) MAKE THE RIGHT CHOICES



At the end of each year, the famous Mercato takes place! Decide on your future by joining a new team or affirming your loyalty to your training club. Increase your business value in order to attract the most reputable teams and optimize your score.
